titles.title: To amend the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to prohibit certain foreign nationals from making disbursements to compensate persons engaging in internet activity promoting, supporting, attacking, or opposing the election of a candidate for public office.
DEFEND Act
DEFEND Act
Defending Elections From Foreign Efforts to Negate Democracy Act
Defending Elections From Foreign Efforts to Negate Democracy Act
DEFEND Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary:
Defending Elections From Foreign Efforts to Negate Democracy Act or the DEFEND Act
This bill prohibits foreign nationals from making disbursements for internet activity promoting, supporting, attacking, or opposing the election of a candidate for public office.
